tag_list: startersfund, crowd, fund, funding, crowdfunding, lawyer, economist, greece, cyprus
overview:
Lawyer & Economist (LLB, MSc in International Business).

Founder & President of StartersFund, the first equity-based Pan-European equity-based crowdfunding platform & Virtual Business Incubator.

Owner of Parissis & Associates, a business-oriented practice offering specialised legal and management consulting services that helps businesses survive the bureaucratic hell of Greece and flourish.

From a 17 years working life, the last 10 are on the Law & Public Administration Consulting, 2 were on Market Research and Management Consulting (2000-2001) and 5 were on advertising and events production management (1992-1996, during undergraduate studies).

Major clients include industry leaders in Greece, like Euromedica Group of Companies and Kappa Research Group of Companies, as well as promising start-ups.
